title: The Bullies Anonymous
description: From point A to Z development. With The Bullies Anonymous, I've done both the physical and digital work. I started this brand as a passion project, to showcase my love for Bully breeds and to provide the community with merchandise to represent their prized pups.

title: TempoLab
description: Prototype by Tempolab at VaniteaSJ was an event that showcased and joined a few different communities in San Jose. It was a cross-collaboration between a few car brands,  a fighting game community, music artists, and of course, a boba shop.
